thread.title: BRIEF-Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Underwritten Public Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Underwritten Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-arrowhead pharmaceuticals announces pricing of underwritten public offering of common stock
public offering of common stock reuters

text:
January 18, 2018 / 2:08 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Underwritten Public Offering Of Common Stock Reuters Staff 
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* ARROWHEAD PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES PRICING OF UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK 
* SAYS PUBLIC OFFERING OF 10.0 MILLION COMMON SHARES PRICED AT $5.25PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
